description: As Playmaker chases after Bowman, the Duelist who stole Jin’s consciousness, two Duelists appear before him and block his path. However, a mysterious Duelist called Soulburner then shows up to help Playmaker. And what’s more… Soulburner also has an Ignis in his Duel Disk!

titles.title: 炎をまといし決闘者[デュエリスト]
